name: AREEBA KHAN
greetingText: No miles can keep us apart because love travels beyond distance. ❤️
wishText: Love with you is like a masterpiece being painted every day. 🎨 You turn the ordinary into extraordinary, and with every laugh, every touch, every moment, I fall deeper into you. 💕 I don’t know where the future will take us, but as long as you’re beside me, I know it will be perfect. 🌟 On this special day, I just want to remind you how wonderful you are. May love, peace, and happiness always find their way to you. Wishing you a lovely Valentine’s Day! 💖
